Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest

Class QuestFactory

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.QuestFactory
@Component @Lazy @Scope("prototype") public final class QuestFactory extends Object
Factory responsible for creating and managing test execution instances.

This class provides a mechanism to create and configure new Quest instances, registering the necessary test services and setting up the execution environment. It ensures that each test scenario has a properly initialized execution context.

    • createQuest

      public Quest createQuest()
      Creates a new Quest instance and sets up the test execution context.

      A new Quest is instantiated, registered with the required services, and assigned to the QuestHolder for retrieval in the test lifecycle.

      Returns:
      The newly created Quest instance.
